Hi, Iâ€™m Badran Elshenawy, a bioinformatician passionate about unraveling the complexity of biological systems through data, computation, and automation.

ðŸ“– My Journey Into Bioinformatics Link to heading

It all started with a fascination for how biological systems adapt and evolve. During my DPhil at Oxford, I dived deep into hypoxic heterogeneity in triple-negative breast cancer (TNBC) ðŸ§«, exploring its molecular landscape using bulk and single-cell RNA sequencing.
